title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Study.  A narrow mountain valley "near Ysapan", Ecuador", July 12, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457e
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  July 12th / Near Ysapan
description: Horizontal view into a narrow mountain valley with a cascading stream running from the background to the foreground at the center of the sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Study.  A narrow mountain valley "near Ysapan", Ecuador", July 12, 1857.
July 12, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-252.
